page.title: 04Wandon Green Farm
page.content: My name is Keith Dyer.I Live at Wandon Green Farm.my Dad is an arable farmer and he keeps 33 cows 1 bull and 600 pigs.At the momement we have 34 calves.Our main prodouct is winter barley but we also grow wheat,beans and oil seed rape.We have 1 combine harvester 6 tractors 1 fork lift truck and a muckspredear.I help my Dad when we move the cows. I have to make sure the cows stay together in a group.I like the cows best. Keith Dyer When I went to Mr Dyers farm ,I liked the pigs best.I like the colour of the piglets because I like pink. Emma Dollimore.
